items.sentence: Tom and Mary don\'t get back to Boston very often.
Tom and Mary don\'t usually enjoy the same things.
I suspect Tom and Mary were the ones who did that.
I suspect that Tom and Mary are afraid to do that.
I suspect that Tom has finished doing that by now.
I got tired of waiting for Tom, so I went on home.
I haven\'t heard anything from Tom in a long time.
I haven\'t swum in the ocean since I left Florida.
I changed my mind about going out and stayed home.
After working all week, we took it easy on Sunday.
